item.title: Tree branches, 29th June
item.description:
The trees from the school next to my house are growing rapidly into my to my back and front garden. This damaging my fence, and I am unable to open the window due to the significant number of insects invading into my property from these trees. It is also worsening my hay fever and giving me breathing difficulties.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iron Mill Lane, Barnes Cray, Dartford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No rubbish collected for 6 days, 29th June
item.description:
There has been no rubbish collection for 6 days. I have a greengrocers opposite and itâ€™s affecting my business as the smell is unbearable for customers from the extreme heat. Also there is at least 2 large rats in and amongst it.

item.title: Constant rubbish bags and litter, 29th June
item.description:
Rubbish bags CONSTANTLY outside the house and strewn across the pavement. It's cleared up and then appears again. Why don't the people doing this have bins to avoid this? It is disgusting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
